Title: anti-Taiwanese contacts poster
Publisher: Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局)
Notes: From a set of six posters, published by the Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局), warning against listening to Taiwanese propaganda.The text reads "If you eavesdrop on enemy stations, write and send counter-revolutionary letters, our relevant departments have the right to seize and investigate you".
